channel.title: Linux auto restarter/shutdown
channel.description: Is there any programs made (for Linux) that are Auto Restarters, and Auto Shutdown programs? or is there any way to make one? ive tried useing WINE on a Windows one but it glitches up...any help?

item.title: Linux auto restarter/shutdown
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:2, topic:431361”]weren’t you the guy that was trying to argue c++ was bad in that other thread?..

C++ started off as a macro library for C.
It then evolved into a massive pile of shit.
Get over it.

nicely said.

YES YOU ARE AHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHA[/quote]

Ah, i cant tell if this is is trolling or what ever…anyway i didnt get into that discussion, i just dont like C++ much

Read full topic
